title: Boundary S-Matrix and Boundary State in Two-Dimensional Integrable Quantum Field Theory
abstract: We study integrals of motion and factorizable S-matrices in two-dimensional integrable field theory with boundary. We propose the ``boundary cross-unitarity equation'' which is the boundary analog of the cross-symmetry condition of the ``bulk'' S-matrix. We derive the boundary S-matrices for the Ising field theory with boundary magnetic field and for the boundary sine-Gordon model.
